title: Letter from Indonesia
brief_description: This is a portrayal of Indonesia as a nation, her geographical location and size, her people and their mode of life, their reliance on our concepts of freedom in their struggle for independence. Concludes with a brief review of current educational and social reforms following 300 years as a colony.
